patthana23.45:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.45:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.45:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
